mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seckill_result (user_id, product_id, seckill_id, result, result_data, sec_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{seckillId}, #{result}, #{resultData}, current_timestamp )
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id userId, a.product_id productId, a.seckill_id seckillId, a.result, a.result_data resultData, a.sec_time secTime, b.product_name productName, b.product_title productTitle FROM seckill_result a LEFT JOIN seckill b ON a.seckill_id = b.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
